definition: As You Like It, comedy by Shakespeare
to everyone's delight and satisfaction
all/each and every/in all cases
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
see 大夫[dai4 fu5]
a breed of horse/variant of 歡|欢[huan1]
joyous/happy/pleased
variant of 歡|欢[huan1]
hubbub/clamor/variant of 歡|欢[huan1]
to be fond of/to like/to enjoy/to be happy/to feel pleased/happiness/delight/glad

sentences.english: The same tank but sanded nicely.
sentences.chinese: 同时，坦克，但用砂纸皆大欢喜。

sentences.english: I can't disclose that, but can say we're happy with the return.
sentences.chinese: 这点我不能透露，不过，投资的回报让大家皆大欢喜。

sentences.english: Yi's signing is a happy ending for all parties.
sentences.chinese: 阿联和雄鹿签约，是一个皆大欢喜结局。

sentences.english: Publishers and advertisers will both be happy.
sentences.chinese: 发布商和广告主都会皆大欢喜。

sentences.english: Still, we promise we'll make an appearance. The appearance is an appeaser.
sentences.chinese: 我们仍然答应会出现，因为这样做皆大欢喜。

sentences.english: It would be good news all round.
sentences.chinese: 所以这会是一个皆大欢喜的好消息。

sentences.english: They weren't big on happy endings in the Dark Ages.
sentences.chinese: 在黑暗时代，故事总没有皆大欢喜的结局。

definition: to satisfy rival demands (idiom)/to get the best of both worlds/to have it both ways/to have one's cake and eat it too
each takes what he needs (idiom)
profitable to both sides/a win-win situation
lit. to push the boat with the current/fig. to take advantage of the situation for one's own benefit
to look favorably on sth/would be glad see it happen
reasonable and fair (idiom)
(of marriage or business partners) to break up (idiom)/to separate
to forget former enmity (idiom)
successful/satisfactory
a tacit mutual understanding
both sides are willing/by mutual consent
logical/only to be expected/rational and clearly structured (of text)
virtuous achievements come to their successful conclusion (idiom)
to convert an enemy into a friend (idiom)
everything is fine (idiom); all is well with the world
a fine thing/a wonderful thing
